title: level up and no reward
body: leveled up from 36-37 no capsule nothing

replies.body:
Hey guys, just wanted to let you know that I see your reports and submitting a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) is a good step so we can take a closer look and assist you directly.  Not sure if something is up or if there are just delays happening.

I forwarded the reports to the support team so we can check it out, but I likely won't hear back for a bit.  Many folks are still on Xgiving break and weekend, but I  wanted to let you know that I hear this even though I don't have visibility on the situation quite yet.  Sorry.  :(

In the meantime, please let me know if it shows up later or after a relog, and submit a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can look into your cases individually.
Happened to me when I just hit level 40
just happened to me too level 44 to 45 {{sticker:sg-janna}} i was so depressed all that work for nothing
Same, think rewards are currently broken or something
happened to me too just now!!
